about_the_game:
Embark on a journey through some legendary stories and Western movies with one of these fantastic paint jobs for your truck and trailer!

Would you become a desperado or a bounty hunter? Or maybe it's the right time to let everyone know there is a new sheriff in town?

This paint jobs pack expansion contains 5 truck and 1 trailer paint jobs:

- Final Draw
- Calamity's Aim
- Last Rites
- Dead or Alive
- Six-gun Sheriff
- Wild West (Trailer Paint Job)

Paint jobs are applicable to all truck/cabin/chassis combinations and to some of the players' ownable trailers as well!
detailed_description:
Embark on a journey through some legendary stories and Western movies with one of these fantastic paint jobs for your truck and trailer!

Would you become a desperado or a bounty hunter? Or maybe it's the right time to let everyone know there is a new sheriff in town?

This paint jobs pack expansion contains 5 truck and 1 trailer paint jobs:

- Final Draw
- Calamity's Aim
- Last Rites
- Dead or Alive
- Six-gun Sheriff
- Wild West (Trailer Paint Job)

Paint jobs are applicable to all truck/cabin/chassis combinations and to some of the players' ownable trailers as well!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
